data.title: Classification of Fungi (Mycology)
data.meta_description: Classification of Fungi (Mycology) - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. CLASSIFICATION OF FUNGI (MYCOLOGY) Sijo.A, M.Sc. Junior Microbiologist DDRC SRL Diagnostics Pvt Ltd, Trivandrum, Kerala, India

2. Classification of Plant Pathogenic Fungi Fungal Like Organisms True Fungi Kingdom Protozoa Kingdom Fungi Plant Pathogenic Fungi Kingdom Chromista (Stremenopiles) Class Myxomycetes Order Physarales Eg. Fuligo, Mucilago, Physarum Phyllum Plasmodiophoromycota Order Plasmodiophorales Eg. Plasmodiophora, Polymyxa,Spongospora Phyllum Myxomycota Class Plasmodiophoromycetes Kingdom Protozoa

3. Kingdom Chromista (Stramenopiles) Phyllum Oomycota Class Oomyetes Order Saproleginiales Eg., Aphanomyces Order Peronosporales Family Pythiaceae Eg., Pythium, Phytophthora Family Peronosporaceae Eg., Peronospora, Plasmopara, Bremia, Pseudoperonospora, Sclerospora Family Albuginaceae Eg., Albugo

4. Phyllum Chytridiomycota Class Chytridiomycetes Eg.,Olpidium Physoderma Synchytrium Phyllum Basidiomycota Kingdom Fungi (True Fungi) Order Mucorales Eg., Rhizopus, Mucor Phyllum Zygomycota Phyllum Ascomycota Class Zygomycetes Order Glomales Eg., Glomus, Acaulospora Gigaspora, Scutellospora

5. Order Taphrinales Eg., Taphrina Phyllum Ascomycota Class Archiascomycetes Order Erysiphales Eg., Erysiphe, levellula, Oidium, Uncinula, Podoshaera, Class Saccharomycetes Eg., Saccharomyces, Galactomyces Phyllum Filamentous Ascomycete Class Pyrenomycetes Class Loculoascomycetes Class Discomycetes Class Deuteromycetes

6. Class Pyrenomycetes Order Hypocreales Eg., Hypocrea Melanospora Nectria Gibberella Claviceps Order Diaporthales Eg. Diaporthe, Gnomonia, Magnaporthe, Cryphonectria, Leucostoma Order Microascales Eg., Ceratocystis Order Phyllachorales Eg., Glomerella Phyllachora Order Ophiostomales Eg., Ophiostoma Order Xylariales Eg., Xylaria, Rosellinia Order Dothidiales Eg., Mycosphaerella, Elsonoe Order Capnodiales Eg., Capnodium Order Pleoporales Eg., Pleopora Cochliobolus Pyrenophora Guignardia Class Loculoascomycetes

7. Order Rhytismales Eg., Hypoderma, Rhytisma, Lophodermium Order Helotiales Eg., Monilinia Sclerotinia Stromatinia Diplocarpon Pseudopeziza Class Discomycetes Form Class Hyphomycetes Eg., Fusarium Cercospora Alternaria Sterile Fungi (Mycelia Sterilia) Eg. Rhizoctonia Sclerotium Class Deuteromycetes Form Class Coelomomycetes Eg., Phyllosticta Colletotrichum
